toolkit.name: 016_aggregate_at_work
toolkit.description: Simple application that showcases the Aggregate operator.

type.name: cityData
type.type: tuple<rstring city, rstring country, uint32 population, uint32 medianAge, uint32 percentageEducated>

type.name: aggregatedCityData
type.type: tuple<uint32 maxPopulation, uint32 maxMedianAge, uint32 minMedianAge, uint32 minEducated>
